kDesc
The fossil of a triceratops skull turned into a hat.\nAncientness: ★★★[#Legal]
Le fossile d'un crâne de tricératops transformé en chapeau.\nAncienneté : ★★★[#Legal]
Das Fossil eines Triceratops-Schädels, das in einen Hut verwandelt wurde.\nAltertümlichkeit: ★★★[#Legal]
Il fossile del cranio di un triceratopo riadattato a copricapo.\nValore storico: ★★★[#Legal]
El fósil de un cráneo de triceratops convertido en sombrero.\nAntigüedad: ★★★[#Legal]
トリケラトプスの頭蓋骨の化石を頭に乗せたもの。\n太古ロマン： ★★★[#Legal]
트리케라톱스의 두개골 화석을 머리에 쓴 것. \n태고로망: ★★★[#Legal]
Wear the skull bone of Triceratops fossil on your head.\n Degree of Ancient Romance: ★★★[#Legal]
